system.description: You request your deity to send you an outsider (typically a celestial, elemental, or fiend) of 6 HD or less. The creature serves you for a limited time (typically 1 minute per caster level). You must offer a payment; the creature may accept or refuse. Tasks that endanger the creature or conflict with its nature require greater payment or may be refused.
system.target: One called outsider of 6 HD or less
